Detailed Description

template<int M>
class AdjacencyMatrix< M >

Class to represent a directed graph as an adjacency matrix

Member Function Documentation

template<int M>
void AdjacencyMatrix< M >::shortest_paths_tree ( int  root,
Eigen::Matrix< int, M, 1 > &  predecessor,
Eigen::Matrix< double, M, 1 > &  cost 
) [inline]

Calculates the shortest paths spanning tree whose root is 'root', putting the resulting tree in 'predecessor' and distances in 'cost'. Uses Dijkstra's algorithm.

Parameters:
root the node we want to be the root of the resulting tree
predecessor vector to hold the resulting tree. Each element holds the index of its parent.
cost vector holding the cost to go from the root to this node.

template<int M>
void AdjacencyMatrix< M >::shortest_spanning_tree ( int &  root,
Eigen::Matrix< int, M, 1 > &  predecessor 
) [inline]

Finds the tree that, among all spanning trees of *this, has the shortest maximum depth, putting the resulting tree in 'predecessor' and the index of the root node in 'root'.

Parameters:
root set to the root of the shortest tree
predecessor set to the resulting tree. Each element holds the index of its parent.
